A C D E G I M N P R S T V

A

add(Point3D) - Method in class mathlib3D.Point3D
Returns a new Point3D whose X,Y,Z values are the sum of this point's values and the specified point's values.
add(Vector3D) - Method in class mathlib3D.Vector3D
Returns a new Vector3D whose X,Y,Z values are the sum of this Vector's values and the specified Vector's values.
add(Vertex3D) - Method in class mathlib3D.Vertex3D
Returns a new Point3D whose X,Y,Z values are the sum of this vertex's location values and the specified vertex's location values.

C

clone() - Method in class mathlib3D.Point3D
Returns a new Point3D which is a deep clone of this Point3D.
clone() - Method in class mathlib3D.Vector3D
Returns a new Vector3D which is a deep clone of this Vector3D.
clone() - Method in class mathlib3D.Vertex3D
Returns a new Object which is a deep clone of this Vertex3D.
concatenate(Matrix3D) - Method in class mathlib3D.Matrix3D
Concatenates a second matrix onto this matrix on the right.
cross(Vector3D) - Method in class mathlib3D.Vector3D
Returns a new Vector3D which is the cross product of this vector with the specified vector.
cross(Vertex3D) - Method in class mathlib3D.Vertex3D
Returns a Vector3D which represents the vector formed by taking the cross product of the vector implied by this vertex's X,Y,Z location with the vector implied by the specified vertex's X,Y,Z location.
cross(Vector3D) - Method in class mathlib3D.Vertex3D
Returns a Vector3D which represents the vector formed by taking the cross product of the vector implied by this vertex's X,Y,Z location with the specified vector.

D

determinant() - Method in class mathlib3D.MatrixInvert
Computes the determinant of this matrix.
distanceTo(Point3D) - Method in class mathlib3D.Point3D
Returns a real number that is the distance between this point and the specified point.
distanceTo(Vertex3D) - Method in class mathlib3D.Vertex3D
Returns a real number that is the distance between this vertex's location and the specified vertex's location.
div(double) - Method in class mathlib3D.Point3D
Returns a new Point3D which is the result of dividing this point by the given divisor.
div(double) - Method in class mathlib3D.Vector3D
Returns a new Vector3D which is the result of dividing this vector by the specified divisor; that is, a scaled copy of this vector.
div(double) - Method in class mathlib3D.Vertex3D
Returns a new Point3D which is the result of dividing this vertex's X,Y,Z location values by the given divisor.
dot(Vector3D) - Method in class mathlib3D.Vector3D
Returns the value of the "dot product" of this Vector with and the specified vector.
dot(Vertex3D) - Method in class mathlib3D.Vertex3D
Returns the value of the "dot product" of the vector implied by this vertex's X,Y,Z with the vector implied by the specified vertex's X,Y,Z.

E

elementAt(int, int) - Method in class mathlib3D.Matrix3D
Returns the element stored in this matrix at the specified location.

mathlib3D - package mathlib3D
 
Matrix3D - Class in mathlib3D
Defines a 3D (4x4) matrix for general transformations.
Matrix3D() - Constructor for class mathlib3D.Matrix3D
Creates a Matrix3D initialized to the identity matrix
Matrix3D(double[]) - Constructor for class mathlib3D.Matrix3D
Creates a Matrix3D containing the contents specified by the given 'values' array.
Matrix3D(double, Vector3D) - Constructor for class mathlib3D.Matrix3D
Creates a new Matrix3D containing the rotation transformation equivalent to a rotation of the specified angle (in degrees) about the specified axis.
MatrixInvert - Class in mathlib3D
This class is a helper class supporting the Matrix3D class; it is not intended to be used directly.
MatrixInvert(double, double, double, double, double, double, double, double, double, double, double, double, double, double, double, double) - Constructor for class mathlib3D.MatrixInvert
 
MatrixInvert(double[]) - Constructor for class mathlib3D.MatrixInvert
 
mid(Point3D) - Method in class mathlib3D.Point3D
Returns a new Point3D which is the midpoint between this point and the specified point.
mid(Vertex3D) - Method in class mathlib3D.Vertex3D
Returns a new Point3D which is the midpoint between this vertex's location and the specified vertex's location.
minus(Point3D) - Method in class mathlib3D.Point3D
Returns a new Point3D whose X,Y,Z values are the difference between this point's X,Y,Z and the specified point's X,Y,Z.
minus(Vector3D) - Method in class mathlib3D.Vector3D
Returns a new Vector3D whose X,Y,Z values are the difference between this Vector's X,Y,Z and the specified Vector's X,Y,Z.
minus(Vertex3D) - Method in class mathlib3D.Vertex3D
Returns a new Point3D whose X,Y,Z values are the difference between this vertex's X,Y,Z location values and the specified vertex's X,Y,Z location values.
mul(double) - Method in class mathlib3D.MatrixInvert
Multiplies each element of this matrix by a scalar.
mult(double) - Method in class mathlib3D.Point3D
Returns a new Point3D which is the result of multiplying this point by the given multiplier.
mult(Matrix3D) - Method in class mathlib3D.Point3D
Returns a new Point3D which is the result of multiplying this point by the given matrix.
mult(double) - Method in class mathlib3D.Vector3D
Returns a new Vector3D which is the result of multiplying this vector by the specified multiplier; that is, a scaled copy of this vector.
mult(Matrix3D) - Method in class mathlib3D.Vector3D
Returns a new Vector3D which is the result of multiplying this Vector by the given matrix.
mult(double) - Method in class mathlib3D.Vertex3D
Returns a new Point3D which is the result of multiplying this vertex's X,Y,Z location values by the given multiplier.
mult(Matrix3D) - Method in class mathlib3D.Vertex3D
Returns a new Vertex3D object which is a clone of this vertex but with a Point3D location generated by multiplying this vertex's location by the specified Matrix3D.

N

normalize() - Method in class mathlib3D.Vector3D
Returns a new Vector3D with the same direction as this vector but with a length of 1.

P

Point3D - Class in mathlib3D
Defines a three-dimensional homogeneous point.

Creates a new Point3D with defaults of X,Y,Z = 0.0 and W = 1.0.

Creates a new Point3D given three coordinates.
Point3D(double, double, double, double) - Constructor for class mathlib3D.Point3D
Creates a new Point3D given three coordinates and a W value.

R

rotate(double, double, double) - Method in class mathlib3D.Matrix3D
Concatenates onto this matrix a rotation about the X, Y, and Z axes by the specified angles, which are assumed to be in radians.
rotateX(double) - Method in class mathlib3D.Matrix3D
Concatenates a rotation about the X axis by amount theta onto this matrix; theta is specified in radians.
rotateY(double) - Method in class mathlib3D.Matrix3D
Concatenates a rotation about the Y axis by amount theta onto this matrix; theta is specified in radians.
rotateZ(double) - Method in class mathlib3D.Matrix3D
Concatenates a rotation about the Z axis by amount theta onto this matrix; theta is specified in radians.

V

Vector3D - Class in mathlib3D
Defines a three-dimensional vector.
Vector3D() - Constructor for class mathlib3D.Vector3D
Creates a new Vector3D with defaults of X,Y,Z = 1.0 and W = 0.0.
Vector3D(double, double, double) - Constructor for class mathlib3D.Vector3D
Creates a new Vector3D with the specified X,Y,Z values; that is, a vector from the origin to (X,Y,Z).
Vector3D(double, double, double, double) - Constructor for class mathlib3D.Vector3D
Creates a new Vector3D with the specified X,Y,Z, and W values; that is, a vector from the origin to (X,Y,Z) and containing the specificied W component.
Vector3D(Point3D) - Constructor for class mathlib3D.Vector3D
Creates a new Vector3D implied by the X,Y,Z values of the specified Point3D; that is, a vector from the origin to the specified point.
Vector3D(Vertex3D) - Constructor for class mathlib3D.Vector3D
Creates a new Vector3D implied by the location of the specified Vertex3D; that is, a vector from the origin to the specified vertex's location.
Vertex3D - Class in mathlib3D
Defines a 3D polygon vertex.
Vertex3D() - Constructor for class mathlib3D.Vertex3D
Creates a new Vertex3D with default values.
Vertex3D(double, double, double) - Constructor for class mathlib3D.Vertex3D
Creates a new Vertex3D with the specified X,Y,Z location coordinates and default W, vertex normal, color, and texture coordinate values.
Vertex3D(double, double, double, double) - Constructor for class mathlib3D.Vertex3D
Creates a new Vertex3D with the specified X,Y,Z, and W location coordinates and default normal, color, and texture coordinate values.
Vertex3D(Point3D) - Constructor for class mathlib3D.Vertex3D
Creates a new Vertex3D with the X,Y,Z, and W values specified by the given Point3D.
